headline: Republican Bernie Moreno drops out of crowded Ohio Senate primary
sentences: Moreno said that during a private meeting with Trump Thursday afternoon, the two agreed the race was filled with too many “Trump candidates,” which could threaten the MAGA movement’s chances of holding onto the Senate seat.

To whomever wins the Senate race, I hope and pray they take the actions needed to stop illegal immigration, bring our manufacturing base back to America, and shrink the size and scale of the Federal Government.

Business leaders recognize patterns before they happen,”
“This decision may surprise some, but it is what I feel gives us the best chance of success.
Republican Bernie Moreno on Thursday dropped out of the crowded Ohio Senate primary, citing a conversation with former President Donald Trump.
Moreno said that during a private meeting with Trump Thursday afternoon, the two agreed the race was filled with too many “Trump candidates."
It’s not too much for Americans to expect their government work for them,” the statement said.
